name: Lanterns, Lamps
description:
#Synopsis

In a parallel world where humans and demons coexist, a dead cat was found in a lotus pond at school.

To prevent the existence of demons from being discovered by humans, the demon world has ruled that members are not allowed to use magic on earth. This strange dead cat has aroused the suspicion of the human world. You have been sent to this school by the underworld as a detective to discover the truth.

Who is it? Who would elaborately murder a cat?

#Controls

Space/return/mouse click.

#Features
  • Around 15 min of gameplay.
  • Infer the murderer through the timeline and partly clues.
  • It is recommended to write down the time points and key clues while playing. 
  • Four different scenes with multiple NPC for a novel version of the narrative experience
  • The victim's monologue gives an idea of the killer's motive after the game over.
#Insights 

The characters' design of this game is based on traditional Chinese mythology and fiction, which is entirely female in portraying the wretchedness and helplessness of female demons on earth.

In some traditional stories, Some female demons survive by seducing men, selling their sexuality and attaching value to them. This was the case in ancient times and much of modern communications media.

This game focuses on creating a complete female storyline, away from the sexualised female character design. The designer hopes to bring a unique and various gaming experience to the player.
